text: Piera Muggiri (born 18 February 1964) is an Italian taekwondo martial artist. She won the silver medal at the 1992 Summer Olympics, where taekwondo was a demonstration sport, in the flyweight event. At the European Taekwondo Championships she became European Champion in 1988 and won the silver medal in 1990 and 1994. == References == Category:Taekwondo practitioners Category:Italian martial artists Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Piera Muggiri
